title: LeaveBusters
body:
I've been put on leavebusters the 3rd time, but I've never afk'd or dc any game ever.

Just finished a game playing shaco, I had to restart computer and was faced with RADS error, had to switch over to laptop to play, finished the game off. We win and I get another leavebusters. 

Surely all my team mates can attest and agree that I wasn't 'ragequitting" or the likes, and this is solo q at a bronze 5 level too.

Is there any way to dispute this leavebusters? All previous times were from random d/c and I'd restart router, try my best to come back and BAM. Leave busters.

T__T

replies.body:
I got 5x20 min low priority que because my laptop restarted unexpectedly, even tho 1. I haven't afk/leave for a long time, 2. I joined back in the game and won. Same question, leave buster is doing more than it should have.

The leave buster was originally designed to act as a penalty to try and improve certain player's actions that will "negatively influence other players' game experience", and Im pretty sure somewhere in the leavebuster's FAQ wrote that they "understand that sometimes emergency and accidents happen" and that they do "give us chances before penalising" but now I have noticed that  the leave buster is stricter than EVER, and IT DOES NOT GIVE ANY CHANCES FOR EMERGENCY/ACCIDENTS, HOW DOES PENALISING PEOPLE FOR EMERGENCY AND/OR ACCIDENTS HELP TO IMPROVE THEIR ACTIONS THAT WILL NEGATIVELY INFLUENCE OTHER PEOPLE?

@riot please notice this and try to make a change 




{{item:3070}} I cri everi tim

LIke even now, I try to play a game. 20 mins wait time.

"Abandoning a match or being AFK" etc etc etc..   I've never done any of these things...
